Linked List 1: A grand bibliography

Oct 13, 2014 | Zacharias

The only part of the Getting Things Done productivity framework that really stuck with me was the notion of ubiquitous capture. Meaning, I do a good job of recording stuff I’ve read, looked at, thought about, etc, in order to…

That’s the part I’m not as great at. But it incidentally does a good job of serving of recording my interests in web tech, and literal miscellany.

And that’s a week
